summary: A collection of pytest suites that verify the core functionality of the PyTorch Lightning framework, covering data module lifecycle, LightningModule behavior, optimizer wrapping, metric result handling, distributed result reduction, and checkpoint loading across various scenarios such as device placement, automatic/manual optimization, gradient clipping, logging, and hyperparameter management.
business_intent: Provide comprehensive regression testing to guarantee the stability and correctness of Lightning's fundamental components, enabling reliable model training, scaling, and deployment for users of the framework.
